web_snippets: Steve Davis. Operto Graduate School of Business - University of Cape Town. Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.
Steve Davis, the CEO of Operto, is a Vancouver native with a rich multicultural background. In this interview, he offers us a glimpse into his unique journey.
